parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Structured Text

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Creates a structured text containing a line break.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lineBreak]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Structured Text]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[composeText]] ["First line", [[lineBreak]], "Second line"];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([[composeText]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[lineBreak]]] == [[parseText]] "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner><br/></inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"); // true</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[composeText]], [[parseText]], [[Structured Text]], [[text]], [[image]], [[endl]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
